title: More Than Gold
description: Shirley Hailstock is one of the most highly acclaimed and popular authors on the Arabesque roster. She has been part of the Arabesque program almost from its beginning in 1994, winning awards and accolades from readers and reviewers along the way."More Than Gold", the seventh novel from this talented author features a striking and innovative package.Hailstock tells the story of Morgan Kirkwood, an Olympic gold-medalist who has been in hiding ever since she helped a Korean political prisoner escape with critical government secrets. But when her cover is blown, she is forced on the run with CIA agent Jack Temple -- and soon finds him endangering her heart's deepest secrets.
author: Shirley Hailstock
